verses.verse: Then <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6378>vial<s%> of <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H3332>poured<s%> it on his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> and said, <S%H3068>"Isn't<s%> it that Yahweh has <S%H4886>anointed<s%> you to be <S%H5057>prince<s%> over his <S%H5159>inheritance?<s%>

When you have <S%H3212>departed<s%> from <S%H5978>me<s%> <S%H3117>today,<s%> then you shall <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> by <S%H7354>Rachel<s%>'s <S%H6900>tomb,<s%> in the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> at <S%H6766>Zelzah;<s%> and they will <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H860>you,<s%> 'The donkeys which you <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> have been <S%H4672>found;<s%> and <S%H1>behold,<s%> your father has <S%H5203>stopped<s%> <S%H1697>caring<s%> about the <S%H860>donkeys,<s%> and is <S%H1672>anxious<s%> for <S%H559>you,<s%> saying, "What shall I <S%H6213>do<s%> for my <S%H1121>son?<s%>"'

"Then you shall go <S%H2498>on<s%> <S%H1973>forward<s%> from <S%H935>there,<s%> and you shall come to the <S%H436>oak<s%> of <S%H8396>Tabor;<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> shall <S%H4672>meet<s%> you there going <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5375>carrying<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> young <S%H1423>goats,<s%> and <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H5375>carrying<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3603>loaves<s%> of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H5375>carrying<s%> a <S%H5035>bottle<s%> of <S%H3196>wine:<s%>
and they <S%H7592>will<s%> <S%H7965>greet<s%> <S%H5414>you,<s%> and give you <S%H8147>two<s%> loaves of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> which you shall <S%H3947>receive<s%> of their <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

<S%H310>"After<s%> that you shall <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H1389>hill<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> where is the <S%H5333>garrison<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines:<s%> and it shall <S%H935>happen,<s%> when you have come there to the <S%H5892>city,<s%> that you shall <S%H6293>meet<s%> a <S%H2256>band<s%> of <S%H5030>prophets<s%> coming <S%H3381>down<s%> from the high <S%H1116>place<s%> with a <S%H5035>psaltery,<s%> and a <S%H8596>tambourine,<s%> and a <S%H2485>pipe,<s%> and a <S%H3658>harp,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5012>them;<s%> and they will be prophesying:

and the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H6743>come<s%> mightily on <S%H5012>you,<s%> and you shall prophesy with <S%H2015>them,<s%> and shall be turned into <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>
Let it <S%H226>be,<s%> when these signs have <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H6213>you,<s%> that you do as <S%H4672>occasion<s%> shall <S%H3027>serve<s%> <S%H430>you;<s%> for God is with you.

"You shall go <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me to <S%H1537>Gilgal;<s%> and <S%H3381>behold,<s%> I will come down to <S%H5927>you,<s%> to offer burnt <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> and to <S%H5927>sacrifice<s%> <S%H2076>sacrifices<s%> of peace <S%H5930>offerings:<s%> you shall <S%H3176>wait<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> until I <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3045>you,<s%> and show you what you shall <S%H6213>do.<s%>"

It was <S%H6437>so,<s%> that when he had turned his <S%H7926>back<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> from <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> <S%H3212>God<s%> <S%H2015>gave<s%> him <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H3820>heart:<s%> and all those <S%H226>signs<s%> <S%H935>happened<s%> that <S%H3117>day.<s%>

When they <S%H935>came<s%> there to the <S%H1389>hill,<s%> <S%H2256>behold,<s%> a band of <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H7125>met<s%> <S%H7307>him;<s%> and the Spirit of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6743>came<s%> mightily on <S%H5012>him,<s%> and he prophesied among <S%H8432>them.<s%>

It <S%H3045>happened,<s%> when all who knew him <S%H865>before<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H5012>that,<s%> behold, he prophesied with the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> then the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H7453>another,<s%> "What is this that has come to the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish?<s%> Is <S%H7586>Saul<s%> also among the <S%H5030>prophets?<s%>"
<S%H376>One<s%> of the same place <S%H6030>answered,<s%> "Who is their <S%H1>father?<s%>" Therefore it became a <S%H4912>proverb,<s%> "Is <S%H7586>Saul<s%> also among the <S%H5030>prophets?<s%>"
When he had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H5012>prophesying,<s%> he <S%H935>came<s%> to the high <S%H1116>place.<s%>

<S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s <S%H1730>uncle<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him and to his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> <S%H575>"Where<s%> did you <S%H1980>go?<s%>" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "To <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H860>donkeys.<s%> When we <S%H7200>saw<s%> that they were not <S%H369>found,<s%> we <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel.<s%>"
<S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s <S%H1730>uncle<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Please <S%H5046>tell<s%> me what <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> said to <S%H559>you.<s%>"

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1730>uncle,<s%> "He <S%H559>told<s%> us <S%H5046>plainly<s%> that the <S%H860>donkeys<s%> were <S%H4672>found.<s%>" But concerning the <S%H1697>matter<s%> of the <S%H4410>kingdom,<s%> of which <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>spoke,<s%> he <S%H5046>didn't<s%> tell him.
<S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H6817>called<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> together to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H4709>Mizpah;<s%>

and he <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> "Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5927><s%> 'I brought up <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and I <S%H5337>delivered<s%> you out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> and out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> that oppressed <S%H3905>you:<s%>'

but you have this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3988>rejected<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> who himself <S%H3467>saves<s%> you out of all your <S%H7451>calamities<s%> and your <S%H6869>distresses;<s%> and you have <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7760>him,<s%> 'No! Set a <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3320>us.<s%>' Now therefore present yourselves <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> by your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> and by your <S%H505>thousands.<s%>"
So <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> brought all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7126>near,<s%> and the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> was <S%H3920>taken.<s%>

He brought the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> by their <S%H4940>families;<s%> and the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4309>Matrites<s%> was <S%H3920>taken;<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish<s%> was <S%H3920>taken:<s%> but when they <S%H1245>sought<s%> <S%H4672>him,<s%> he could not be found.

Therefore they <S%H7592>asked<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H376>further,<s%> "Is there yet a man to <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H1988>here?<s%>" <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>answered,<s%> <S%H2244>"Behold,<s%> he has hidden himself among the <S%H3627>baggage.<s%>"

They <S%H7323>ran<s%> and <S%H3947>fetched<s%> him <S%H3320>there;<s%> and when he stood <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> he was <S%H1361>higher<s%> than any of the <S%H5971>people<s%> from his <S%H7926>shoulders<s%> and <S%H4605>upward.<s%>

<S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to all the <S%H5971>people,<s%> "You <S%H7200>see<s%> him whom <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H977>chosen,<s%> that there is none like him among all the <S%H5971>people?<s%>" All the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7321>shouted,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2421>live!<s%>"

Then <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H1696>told<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> the <S%H4941>regulations<s%> of the <S%H4410>kingdom,<s%> and <S%H3789>wrote<s%> it in a <S%H5612>book,<s%> and laid it <S%H3240>up<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>away,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H1004>house.<s%>

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> also <S%H1980>went<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H1390>Gibeah;<s%> and there <S%H3212>went<s%> with him the <S%H2428>army,<s%> whose <S%H3820>hearts<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H5060>touched.<s%>

But certain <S%H1100>worthless<s%> <S%H1121>fellows<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "How shall this man <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H959>us?<s%>" They despised <S%H935>him,<s%> and brought him no <S%H4503>present.<s%> But he held his <S%H2790>peace.<s%>
